plot: The daily lives of two women, a white widow in her seventies and her young Afro-Caribbean maid, as they struggle to keep the house clean, the meat seasoned and the soap opera on TV, without killing each other by the end of day.
title: Tú y yo
plot_es: The daily lives of two women, a white widow in her seventies and her young Afro-Caribbean maid, as they struggle to keep the house clean, the meat seasoned and the soap opera on TV, without killing each other by the end of day.
plot_en: The daily lives of two women, a white widow in her seventies and her young Afro-Caribbean maid, as they struggle to keep the house clean, the meat seasoned and the soap opera on TV, without killing each other by the end of day.
